page.title: 02WHAT I DO AT THE WEEKEND
page.content: At the weekend I get up at nine o clock,then I go and watch the workers who are building my school.When I get tired I help in the shop with my Mum and Dad.Then we have dinner and shut the shop.After that we usually go out to Aberystwyth or we watch the television.When we come back from Aberystwyth we normally have our tea and watch the television, then we play a game of Cludo,Guess Who? or anything else.At eleven o clock we go to bed and I draw a picture for a while or I read then I go to sleep.On Sunday morning we have cooked breakfast of bacon,eggs,sausages and fried bread.Then we go for a walk and when we come back we put the dinner on.After dinner we watch Eastenders and Paul,Mark,Natasha and I play a game and my Mum and Dad have a sleep,then when they wake up it is
